whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Business
whatsapp.description: Connect your WhatsApp number to automate bookings and reminders
whatsapp.connectDescription: Connect your WhatsApp Business account with one click. You just need to authorize permissions in Meta and we'll handle the rest.
whatsapp.supportAgentDescription: Allow your customers to connect with a human agent when they press "Help"
whatsapp.supportAgentPhoneHint: WhatsApp number of the agent who will receive requests (E.164 format, e.g.: 5491170590570)
whatsapp.botPersonalizationDescription: Customize the messages that the WhatsApp bot sends to your customers. Use {name} to replace the customer's name.
whatsapp.greetingHint: Message that appears when the customer writes 'hello' for the first time
whatsapp.greetingWithNameHint: Message when the customer is already registered. Use {name} for the name
whatsapp.welcomeMessageHint: Text that appears in the bot's main menu
whatsapp.welcomeFullMessageHint: Longer and more personalized message that appears in the main menu. You can use {name} to include the customer's name. If empty, the short welcome message will be used.
whatsapp.nameRequestHint: Message to ask the new customer for their name
whatsapp.branchSelectionHint: Message when there are multiple branches available
whatsapp.serviceSelectionHeaderHint: Title when showing the service list
whatsapp.instructorSelectionBodyHint: Text when showing the list of professionals/instructors
whatsapp.saveChangesNote: Changes will be saved together with the rest of the configuration using the "Save Changes" button above
whatsapp.phoneNumberIdHint: WhatsApp Business phone number ID. Find it in Meta Business Manager > WhatsApp > API Setup > Phone number ID
whatsapp.phoneNumberIdRequired: Phone Number ID is required to send messages. Find it in Meta Business Manager.
whatsapp.oauthConnectedMessage: OAuth connected successfully. Enter your WhatsApp number, Phone Number ID and save changes.
whatsapp.connectOneClick: Connect your WhatsApp Business account with one click.
whatsapp.connectedSuccessDescription: Now enter your WhatsApp number, Phone Number ID and click 'Save Changes'.
whatsapp.oauthConnectedButNoBusinessDescription: The OAuth token was saved correctly. Now enter your WhatsApp number and the Phone Number ID found in Meta Business Manager.
whatsapp.cantStartConnection: Could not start WhatsApp Business connection
whatsapp.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect WhatsApp Business? All credentials will be removed and you will not be able to send messages until you reconnect.
whatsapp.invalidPhoneToast: Enter the WhatsApp number with country code (e.g.: +54911...)
whatsapp.cantRefreshPhoneId: Could not refresh Phone Number ID

tutorial.step1: Create or access your Meta Business Manager and make sure you have a WhatsApp Business Account.
tutorial.step2: Verify the phone number you will use in WhatsApp Business.
tutorial.step3: Click â€œConnectâ€ to authorize with Meta and save the token.
tutorial.step4: Enter the phone number in international format (+54911...).
tutorial.step5: Enter the Phone Number ID (find it in Meta Business Manager > WhatsApp > API Setup).
tutorial.step6: Save changes, enable the assistant and test a send.

statusPanel.readyDesc: The assistant responds automatically using the centralized integration.
statusPanel.disabledDesc: The assistant is paused. You can enable it again anytime.
statusPanel.oauthDesc: OAuth connected successfully. Enter your WhatsApp number and save it to enable the assistant.
statusPanel.pendingDesc: Save your WhatsApp number to complete the setup.

statusTips.ready1: The assistant replies automatically with your business information.
statusTips.ready2: You can send test messages or start campaigns from the support panel.
statusTips.disabled1: Enable the assistant to resume sending reminders and confirmations.
statusTips.oauth1: OAuth connected successfully. Enter your WhatsApp number and save it.
statusTips.oauth2: Once the number is saved, you can enable the assistant manually.
statusTips.pending1: Save the number and contact us to finalize linking in Meta Business.
statusTips.pending2: When the connection is ready you'll be able to enable the assistant and send tests.

config.title: Configuration
config.businessNameHint: The business name cannot be changed
config.arcaDescription: Configure the necessary data to issue electronic invoices with ARCA
config.changesApplyImmediately: Changes will apply immediately after saving
config.noAccessTitle: You don't have permission to view Configuration
config.noAccessDescription: Ask an administrator to grant you access to this module.

security.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account with authentication codes

membership.emptyMessage: No membership plans yet. Create at least one to enforce monthly billing.
membership.name: Name

workingHours.overtimeDescription: Hours worked outside the configured work schedule will be automatically counted as overtime. This calculation applies to attendance records and staff shifts.
workingHours.sectionDescription: Configure your business working hours per branch to calculate employee overtime
workingHours.infoTextWorkHours: Working hours define the normal work schedule per branch. Any hour worked outside these hours will be considered overtime and automatically calculated for employees.
workingHours.noBranches: No branches configured. Configure at least one branch to set working hours.

businessType.description: Configure the business type and enabled features
businessType.planFeaturesDescription: Here you can view the features available in your current plan and upgrade options if you need more capabilities.
businessType.maxPlanMessage: You already have the most complete plan available. If you need custom features, contact our team.

featureDescriptions.classes: Manage group classes and class bookings

businessType.confirmChangeType: You are about to change the business type from "{from}" to "{to}".
businessType.confirmUpdateFeatures: You are about to update the enabled features.
businessType.changeTypeWarning: Changing the business type will replace your current services with the defaults of the new type. Save or export your services if you need to keep them.

toasts.contactOwnerManage: Contact the system owner to manage these changes.
toasts.noChanges: There are no changes to save.
toasts.restoredDefaults: Default features of the selected type have been restored.
toasts.needHigherPlan: You need a higher plan to enable this feature.
toasts.contactOwnerChangeType: Contact the system owner to change the business type and update your plan.

calendar.description: Configure the time range that will be displayed in the calendar
calendar.infoText: Define the time range shown in the calendar. This lets you customize which hours of the day are visible in Day, Week and Agenda views.
calendar.startHourHint: Minimum time shown in the calendar
calendar.endHourHint: Maximum time shown in the calendar

arca.centralizedDescription: You only need your CUIT. The system invoices on your behalf using centralized certificates. You do not need to configure your own certificates nor perform AFIP procedures.
arca.cuitHint: Your 11-digit CUIT (no dashes). The system will invoice on your behalf using this CUIT.
arca.puntoVentaHint: If you have a specific point of sale, enter it here. Otherwise the system will use the default.
arca.checkingNote: This may take a few seconds if the server queries AFIP.
arca.howTitle: How does centralized invoicing with ARCA work?
arca.howDescription: Our team maintains the certificates and credentials. We only need your CUIT to issue documents on your behalf.

steps.saveCuitText: Enter the CUIT and save the configuration. The system uses it to generate your invoices.
steps.verifyText: Use the Verify connection button to confirm the server is ready.
steps.emitTestText: When the status is OK, generate a test invoice to confirm AFIP responds correctly.

arca.ownCertsTitle: Do you want to use your own certificates?
arca.ownCertsDescription: Write to support and we will help you enable advanced mode. You will need to upload your .p12 certificate or the .crt and .key files, along with the password.
arca.testDescription: Generate a test invoice for $121 to verify everything works correctly
arca.credentialsMissing: System credentials missing on the server.
arca.envSetupIntro: The system administrator must configure in the
arca.wsaaUrl: WSAA authentication service URL. If not specified, default URLs are used by environment.
arca.wsfeUrl: WSFE invoicing service URL. If not specified, default URLs are used by environment.
arca.alternativeText: You can also use separate certificates (.crt and .key) by placing them in

booking.title: Bookings and memberships
booking.description: Configure if the system requires up-to-date membership before allowing class enrollment
booking.requireLabel: Require up-to-date membership to enroll in classes
booking.requireDescription: Block class enrollment if the customer has no active subscription. Ideal for gyms or clubs. Individual appointments do not require membership.
booking.noteDisabled: When disabled, any customer can enroll in classes even without an active membership. Individual appointments are always available without membership (recommended for salons and studios without monthly fees).
booking.membershipPlansDescription: Define the prices and durations of the fees you will control.

mp.checkCanReceive: â€¢ Verify that your account is enabled to receive online payments
mp.inTestingMode: â€¢ Your account is in TEST mode. To receive real payments you need PRODUCTION mode
mp.tokenExpiredDesc: Access token has expired. Disconnect and reconnect to renew it.
mp.noAccountInfo: Could not fetch detailed account information
mp.authPrompt: When connecting, Mercado Pago will request authorization to:
mp.depositFixedInfo: All services will require a ${amount} deposit

deposit.percentageDesc: Calculate deposit as % of the service

commissionsConfig.title: Commissions Configuration
commissionsConfig.calculateOnDepositDesc: Calculate commissions on the deposit amount instead of total price
commissionsConfig.showInDashboardDesc: Show commission metrics on the main dashboard
commissionsConfig.configureIndividualsPrefix: To configure individual commissions per instructor,

reminders.title: Appointment Reminders
reminders.description: Configure automatic WhatsApp reminders for your customers
reminders.whatAreDescription: Reminders are sent automatically via WhatsApp to your customers before their appointments. This helps reduce no-shows and improve attendance.
reminders.enableDesc: Turn automatic reminders on or off. When enabled, the system will send messages automatically based on the configured hours.
reminders.whenLabel: How long before the appointment should the reminder be sent?
reminders.whenHint: Set how many hours before the appointment you want the reminder to be sent. Maximum 7 days (168 hours).

examples.oneDay: â€¢ 24 hours = Sent 1 day before the appointment
examples.twoDays: â€¢ 48 hours = Sent 2 days before the appointment
examples.twoHours: â€¢ 2 hours = Sent 2 hours before the appointment
examples.twelveHours: â€¢ 12 hours = Sent 12 hours before (half day before)

importantItems.auto: Reminders are sent automatically via WhatsApp to your customers
importantItems.statuses: Only sent for appointments with status confirmed or scheduled
importantItems.once: Each appointment receives a single reminder (not repeated)
importantItems.interval: The system checks every 15 minutes and sends reminders for appointments within the configured window
importantItems.requirement: Requirement: WhatsApp must be configured and active in the configuration section

configGeneralInfo.title: Important information:
configGeneralInfo.whatsappNumberHint: WhatsApp number must include country code (e.g.: +54 for Argentina)
configGeneralInfo.cuitRequiredHint: CUIT is required to issue electronic invoices
configGeneralInfo.dataUseHint: These data can be used on invoices and communications

routines.title: Workout Routines
routines.manageAndAssign: Manage and assign workout routines to your customers
routines.searchPlaceholder: Search routines by name, description or difficultyâ€¦
routines.routinesWillAppear: Routines will appear here when created
routines.noExercises: No exercises. Click "Add exercise" to get started.
routines.searchCustomer: Search customer by name or phone...
routines.noCustomersFound: No customers found with that criteria
routines.importDocument: The document must contain the routine name, exercises with sets and repetitions
routines.autoDetect: The system will automatically detect: name, exercises, sets, repetitions, rest and sections.
routines.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the routine "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
routines.uploadWordFile: Upload a Word (.docx) file with a routine. The system will try to automatically extract the routine information.
